# Sold2Move

> Real-time sold property listings and leads for moving companies in Canada and the USA.

Sold2Move is a B2B SaaS platform that provides moving companies with real-time access to recently sold home listings. When a home sells, the new owners often need moving services - Sold2Move connects movers with these high-intent leads.

## What We Offer

- **Real-Time Sold Listings**: Access to recently sold properties across North America, including hard-to-get Canadian data
- **Geo-Targeted Leads**: Filter listings by location to focus on your service areas
- **Verified Data**: All listings are verified and timely
- **Mailing Services**: Direct mail marketing tools to reach new homeowners
- **Dashboard Analytics**: Track your leads and measure ROI

## Target Audience

Moving companies, relocation services, and related businesses looking to generate leads from people who have just purchased homes and likely need moving services.

- [Home](https://sold2move.com/): Main landing page with product overview
- [How It Works](https://sold2move.com/how-it-works): Detailed explanation of the platform
- [Pricing](https://sold2move.com/pricing): Subscription plans and pricing
- [FAQ](https://sold2move.com/faq): Frequently asked questions
- [About](https://sold2move.com/about): Company information
- [Contact](https://sold2move.com/contact): Get in touch
- [Request Demo](https://sold2move.com/request-demo): Schedule a live demo

## Regional Coverage

- [Canada Sold Listings](https://sold2move.com/canada-sold-listings): Coverage across Canada
- [Ontario Sold Listings](https://sold2move.com/ontario-sold-listings): Ontario-specific listings
- [Toronto Sold Listings](https://sold2move.com/toronto-sold-listings): Greater Toronto Area
- [Vancouver Sold Listings](https://sold2move.com/vancouver-sold-listings): Metro Vancouver
- [USA Sold Listings](https://sold2move.com/usa-sold-listings): United States coverage

- [How Moving Companies Can Use Sold Listings](https://sold2move.com/how-moving-companies-can-use-sold-listings-ontario): Guide for Ontario movers
- [Sold House Listings Guide for Movers](https://sold2move.com/sold-house-listings-canada-guide-movers): Comprehensive Canadian guide
- [Sample Mailers](https://sold2move.com/sample-mailers): Direct mail templates and examples
